scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test npm run eslint:fix && npx jest -i
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production rm -rf ./dist && npm run eslint:fix && npx ttsc -P ./tsconfig.json --outDir dist && babel dist -d dist
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npx nodemon --watch "src/**" --ext "ts,json" --exec "npm run eslint:fix && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --files src/server.ts"
scripts.migration:generate: npm run build && npm run typeorm migration:generate --
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && npm run typeorm migration:run
